feup.lpoo.bounce.logic

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • feup.lpoo.bounce.logic.Monster

  • public class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
    Class the handles the Monster's movement. Created by Bernardo Belchior & Margarida Viterbo on 06-06-2016.

        Monster default constructor
        Parameters:
        monster - Box2d body that represents the monster
        movementWidth - Movement delta from the initial position in the x axis
        movementHeight - Movement delta from the initial position in the y axis
